EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining us!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for attending our webcast, APU - Technical Updates and Roadmap! Hello {{lead.First Name:default=customer}},
Thank you for attending our APU - Technical Updates and Roadmap!
This webcast is now on-demand <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/tVM2NiDUjCcSS8j81soEJb?]]>, should you like to view it again. Please use code 112233.
Stay in the loop with us and youâ€™ll be among the first to learn about upcoming webinars, events, product launches and more! Sign up here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/forms/subscription-page]]>.
We look forward to seeing you again!
Thank you, Honeywell Aerospace WATCH NOW <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/tVM2NiDUjCcSS8j81soEJb?]]>
